meanings.definition: One of the sections into which a long poem is divided.
meanings.sent1: The epic poem had many cantos, each telling a different part of the story.
meanings.sent2: The poet read aloud from the next canto of his masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: In the canto of the poem about nature, the trees and rivers spoke to each other.
meanings.sent4: The canto of emotions in the poem painted a vivid picture of heartbreak and joy.
meanings.sent5: The canto describing the battle was so intense, it felt like being on the battlefield.

meanings.definition: A division of a long poem.
meanings.sent1: The ancient epic had twelve cantos, each revealing a different part of the hero's journey.
meanings.sent2: The poet carefully crafted each canto to evoke a specific emotion in the reader.
meanings.sent3: The canto about love in the poem made even the toughest warriors shed a tear.
meanings.sent4: The final canto of the poem was like a grand finale, leaving the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The canto describing the storm was so vivid, you could almost feel the rain on your skin.
